archimate:Folder.name: Stakeholder & External Relations Management
archimate:Folder.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description The Stakeholder & External Relations Management processes grouping focus on managing the enterprise's relationship with stakeholders and outside entities. Stakeholders include shareholders, employee organizations, etc. Outside entities include regulators and local community. Some of the processes within this grouping are Shareholder Relations, External Affairs and Public Relations. Extended Description The Stakeholder & External Relations Management process grouping focuses on managing the enterprise's relationship with stakeholders and outside entities. Stakeholders include shareholders, employee organizations, etc. Outside entities include regulators, local community, unions. Some of the processes within this grouping are Shareholder Relations, External Affairs, Labor Relations, Public Relations.
